title: Changes to remake system in ranked
body: Can you pls change the remake system so that if someone disconnects before 5 min (in addition to failing to connect to game), that teams are entitled to a remake. ive already lost 2 games in the past week where my jgler connected to the game but left before 3 min and dc'd for a period of 15+ min. It is unfair that we aren't allowed to remake in these situations and we don't deserve to suffer for one player's malfunctioning internet or pc. I hope u consider this change riot games.
